plot: A young man dreamed of a career in comics and movies. But his father would rather gave up all he had in order to let him receive formal education.
title: Foo ji ching
plot_es: A young man dreamed of a career in comics and movies. But his father would rather gave up all he had in order to let him receive formal education.
plot_en: A young man dreamed of a career in comics and movies. But his father would rather gave up all he had in order to let him receive formal education.
